definitions.definition: The edible immature mucilaginous seed pod ( properly , capsule ) of the Abelmoschus esculentus .
The flowering mallow plant Abelmoschus esculentus itself , now commonly grown in the tropics and warmer parts of the temperate zones .

main_definition: The edible immature mucilaginous seed pod ( properly , capsule ) of the Abelmoschus esculentus .
secondary_definitions: The flowering mallow plant Abelmoschus esculentus itself , now commonly grown in the tropics and warmer parts of the temperate zones .
